# Class References

Source code locations and documentation URLs for further investigation.

| Class | Description | Inherits | Source | Documentation |
|-------|-------------|----------|--------|---------------|
| `ui.badge` | Badge/tag element | ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/badge.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/badge) |
| `ui.button` | Clickable button | DisableableElement → ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/button.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/button) |
| `ui.button_group` | Group of buttons | ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/button_group.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/button_group) |
| `ui.checkbox` | Checkbox input | ValueElement → DisableableElement → ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/checkbox.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/checkbox) |
| `ui.chip` | Chip/tag element | ValueElement → DisableableElement → ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/chip.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/chip) |
| `ui.codemirror` | Code editor (CodeMirror) | ValueElement → DisableableElement → ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/codemirror/codemirror.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/codemirror) |
| `ui.color_input` | Color input field | ValueElement → DisableableElement → ui.element | [source](https://github.com/zauberzeug/nicegui/blob/main/nicegui/elements/color_input.py) | [docs](https://nicegui.io/documentation/color_input) |
